newsitem.title: USA: Living Centers, GranCare to merge.
newsitem.headline: Living Centers, GranCare to merge.

text.p: Living Centers of America Inc and GranCare Inc have agreed to merge in a $1.8 billion deal that will create the second-largest long-term care provider in the United States, the companies said on Thursday.

Under terms of the agreement approved by boards of both companies, Living Centers shareholders will receive $40.50 a share in cash for 93 percent of Living Center's outstanding common stock, the companies said.
The Living Center shareholders will retain the remaining 7.0 percent of the stock under a recapitalization, they said.
